author: Al Jazeera
title: Italians using 'any excuse' to evade lockdown: Atalanta captain
description: The football star said the threat of coronavirus was taken too lightly at the start of the outbreak.
content:
Atalanta football club captain Alejandro Gomez has said people in his team's home of Bergamo, the northeastern city in Italy's Lombardy region that is the most badly affected by the coronavirus pandemic, are using any excuse to try to evade a lockdown.
